Entry.en-US: Calamities will occur much later in the game and much less frequently
Entry.ja: 自然災害はゲームの最終盤に発生し、その頻度は非常に低い

Entry.ja: 自然災害はゲームの後半に発生し、その頻度は低い

Entry.en-US: There will be a balanced level of Calamities
Entry.ja: 自然災害はゲーム全体を通してバランスよく発生する

Entry.en-US: Calamities will occur earlier in the game and more frequently
Entry.ja: 自然災害は序盤より発生し、頻度は高い

Entry.en-US: Calamities will occur much earlier in the game and much more frequently
Entry.ja: 災害は最序盤より発生し、その頻度は非常に高い
